Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the appointment process for state board positions
Summary: Relates to the appointment process for state board positions; provides for a 60 day time period to conduct a background check on potential nominees to state board positions before they can officially be appointed.
LawCode: Amd §§39, 40, 41 & 43, Pub Off L; amd §§6 & 7, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law and the legislative law, in relation to the appointment process for state board positions
